rule: Only items that are mentioned in a Beatles song can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are mentioned in a nursery rhyme can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are referenced in famous paintings can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are mentioned in a Shakespearean play can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that have been mentioned in an Oscar-winning movie script can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that have been represented on a national flag can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are mentioned in renowned science fiction novels can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that have been referenced in a Nobel Prize-winning piece of literature can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are mentioned in famous architectural landmarks can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are mentioned or referenced in classic board games can be brought to the picnic.
